title: crash game @@
body: i try to play Lol today, in the morning the game was very good but from the afternoon to now its just cant connect even my internet still work pretty good and when i connect to the fourth game when i just come out the lane then its attempting to connect i try to log out then reconnect then its still suck and i feed about over 6 time everytime go out the lane then try to farm its ok then when the enemy come im just stay there cant move cant do anything then attempting to connect lost the game =((, and now when i go to queue and when i pic its ok then when its almost load the game then its cant connect again then its made me 3 time like that and now im the dogde the queue and wait 20 min, then i wait and hopely its ok then again almost go to ban pic screen its can connect to the sever omg someone plz help me @@

replies.body: When the game seems to freeze up like that and you can't get your champ to respond, followed by multiple reconnects, it really makes me think your network signal might be having some problems with packet loss which is interrupting your connection. Let's run a quick test for any packet loss by doing a traceroute for about 5-10 to our NA servers at 104.160.131.1 and post the results here for me to take a look.
i tried but its seem to be the same, the first game when i try to play its ok everything ok but then the next game after go to the game then its just connect all time and its freeze @@
